scenario_text.value: So Aoi, about what happens next...
Zzz... Zzz... Mm...
Uh, Aoi? Are you asleep?

That’s rare. Still, things did get tense. No
wonder she’s tired. I should let her rest.
Mm... Oh... Takuma...

Hm? Did I wake you? ...Uh, I guess not. She
must have been talking in her sleep.

That’s...not food... Maybe if you...ate
Agumon...

What kind of nightmare is that?! Aoi, wake
up! Don’t even dream about that happening!

Man, that was terrifying. I didn’t know what
happened to you, Dracumon.

Sorry, Kaito. I mean, I don’t remember
anything, but...sorry.

Kaito, Dracumon never meant to do that.
Everything’s fine now.

Don’t get me wrong. It’s not like I was
blaming Dracumon.

It’s just...I don’t ever want to lose you.
I never want to go through that again.

Of course! I wouldn’t fall for the same trick
twice. After all, I like being your partner.

Takuma, you stick with Agumon too. I want to
save everyone, including our partners.

Yeah. I never want to feel like that again
either. I’m keeping Agumon close from now on.

So Floramon, do you remember turning against
us?

Not at all. Takuma, you didn’t try anything
with Saki while I was out of it, did you?

Of course not! You really think I’d do
something like that?

Well, Saki is really cute. You think so too,
don’t you?
Well, uh... I guess... Ha ha...
What? You really mean that?

Oh, uh...never mind, okay! I’m going over
there to start getting ready to go!
Heheheheh... Almost got you, didn’t I?

Listen... I don’t remember anything, but...
I didn’t hurt Shuuji, did I?
Well, Lopmon...

...I was afraid of that. I don’t remember it,
but I could feel something. I... I...

Don’t worry about it, Lopmon! I actually
think what happened was good.
But Shuuji, why?

Earlier, I hurt you because of my immaturity.
You forgave me, but it stuck with me.

Maybe I’ve been wishing you’d hit me this
whole time. I feel like now we’re square.
...Humans sure are weird.

But I guess...if you’re okay with what
happened, then I’m glad!
Takuma! Hey, Takuma! Do you have a minute?
Shakomon? What’s wrong?

Something’s wrong with Miu. She’s been curled
up crying with me. She only just fell asleep.

Yeah, that doesn’t surprise me. Miu took it
pretty hard while you were out of it.

Hm? Shakomon? Shakomon, where are you?! I told
you not to leave me alone!

It’s okay, Miu. I’m sorry I made you worry.
I won’t go anywhere, okay?

You mean it? I want you right here! Oh,
Takuma. You stay with me too, okay?

You want me too, huh? Haha, okay. I guess
I could take a break here.

Man, all that time we stayed here and we had
no idea.

Yeah. Who would’ve thought one of the Four
Holy Beasts was right here all along?

Talk about missing something right in front
of your face.

Yeah, but life is full of stuff like that.
I feel like it happens to me a lot.

Like I’ll be sitting on a rubber band or
wearing a hat I thought I’d lost.
I don’t think those are quite the same thing.

I guess if you had to sum up our situation,
you’d say it’s the eve of the final battle.

Yeah, you’re right. You seem pretty relaxed,
though, Ryo.

I’m not sure how to put it, but it’s like
you’re a different, more reliable person.

Hey, watch what you’re saying! You make it
sound like I was totally unreliable before!

...Actually, I guess I kind of was. Even I
have to admit I was a bit of a jerk at first.

See! You’d never have admitted that before.
I like you a lot better now, Ryo.

Man, I don’t even know what to say to that.
I can never win with you, Takuma.
